install.name: Simple File Lister v1.0
install.author: Anders Wasen
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2011 Anders Was√©n. All rights reserved.
install.description: A simple module that will list files from a directory set in teh settings. Will allow a user to list the given directory fetched from the parameter settings.

param.name: sfl_dirlocation
param.label: Default Directory
param.description: This is a default directory that will be listed.

param.name: sfl_basepath
param.label: Web server base path (http://xyz...)
param.description: You need to add the baseurl for teh above directory, inluding the directory to use for creating the web-links. It must start with http/https or ftp. E.g. if your directory to list is ./images in your Joomla root this should be http://www.mysamplesite.com/images/

param.name: sfl_maxfiles
param.label: Max. files to list
param.description: This is the maximum allowed files to list. Set it to zero for no limit.

param.name: sfl_next
param.label: Use Next button
param.description: Add Next/Previous buttons if list exceeds Max. files to list.

param.name: sfl_showfilesize
param.label: Show file size
param.description: Will add teh filesize after the file name.

param.name: sfl_maxheight
param.label: Max. box height (in pixels)
param.description: This is the maximum allowed height for the file list box in pixels. Set it to zero to let it grow.

param.name: sfl_bgcolor
param.label: Background color
param.description: The background color of the file list box.

param.name: sfl_onlyimg
param.label: List only images
param.description: List only images or all files in directory.

param.name: sfl_imgthumbs
param.label: Use thumbnails
param.description: Use thumbnails for images. Select Only to not show file-name, only thumb-nail image.

param.name: sfl_thumbheight
param.label: Max. thumbnail height (in pixels)
param.description: This is the maximum allowed height for a thumbnail.

param.name: sfl_thumbkeepaspect
param.label: Keep aspect ratio of thumbnail
param.description: Use thumbnails in correct aspect ratio, else they will be resized into max. height/width.

param.name: sfl_listdir
param.label: List directories
param.description: Also list sub-directories ontop of the files.

param.name: sfl_browsedir
param.label: Browse sub-directory
param.description: Allow the user to enter sub-directories.

param.name: sfl_useusernameddir
param.label: Use user named directory
param.description: This will show the logged on users files instead of the default path given above.

param.name: sfl_usernameddirdefault
param.label: ONLY show user named directory
param.description: Will omit the default directory from directory list. Directory list will only contain the users own files, i.e. Default Directory above will never be used!.

param.name: sfl_userlocation
param.label: User named directories root path
param.description: This is the directory where uploaded files for user specific files are placed (NB! Server path, not web URL). E.g. the user Anders files would be under ./users/Anders/.

param.name: sfl_basepathusr
param.label: Web server users path (http://xyz...)
param.description: If your Default User Directory lies outside of the Joomla web-root or you are using sub-domains you need to add the baseurl, inluding the directory to use for creating the web-links. It must start with http/https or ftp

param.label: Do you like it?
param.description: Feel like showing your appreciation? (v1.3.0.36)

param.name: sfl_allowupdir
param.label: Allow moving up in directories
param.description: This is NOT recommended! This will allow a user to add a path for moving backwards in directorystructure, beyond your Default Directory, using the AJAX query URL.

param.name: sfl_allowdelete
param.label: Allow delete files
param.description: This is NOT recommended! To allow delete of files you must enable this first.

param.name: sfl_allowdeleteall
param.label: Allow delete files for all
param.description: This is NOT recommended! It will allow any user (even not logged in) to delete files from the list.

param.name: sfl_allowdeletereg
param.label: Allow delete files for registered
param.description: This is NOT recommended! It will allow any registered user to delete files from the list.

param.name: sfl_allowdeleteedt
param.label: Allow delete files for editors
param.description: It will allow any user registered as editor to delete files from the list.

param.name: sfl_movedeleted
param.label: Move instead of delete
param.description: If you want to move files instead of deleting them to the directory below.

param.name: sfl_movedeletedpath
param.label: Move to directory for deleted
param.description: If you want to move files instead of delete they will end up in this directory. If the directory does not exist it will be created. Files will get a unique file extension to not overwrite existing files.

param.name: sfl_jqueryinclude
param.label: Load jQuery through Joomla
param.description: This will load jQuery through Joomla or nativly (hard).

param.name: sfl_jquery
param.label: Prevent jQuery 1.4.3 loading
param.description: This will exclude jQuery from loading in Simple File Upload. There are other extensions/templates that can cause conflicts, use this to eliminate any jQuery conflicts.

param.name: sfl_disablegdthreshold
param.label: GD library size limit
param.description: This is the threshold (max size in bytes) for where GD library should not be used. Set to zero for no threshold.

param.name: sfl_showdir
param.label: Show directory label
param.description: Show the path of the directory listed.

param.name: sfl_showicon
param.label: Show icons
param.description: Show an icon in front of the directory or file.

param.name: sfl_sortorder
param.label: Default sort order
param.description: Default sort order of files.

param.name: sfl_showsort
param.label: Show user sort option
param.description: Show arrows for sorting Asc/Desc to user.

param.name: sfl_boxleft
param.label: Lister box left position
param.description: In some templates the box with the list is pushed too far to the left. Change this value to move the box to the left (reduce value) or to the right (increase value).

param.name: sfl_listleft
param.label: List left position
param.description: In some templates the list is pushed too far to the left. Change this value to move the list inside the box to the left (reduce value) or to the right (increase value).

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: Module Class Suffix
